text: The Ipcress File is a 1965 British political spy thriller movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and was based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Len Deighton. It stars Michael Caine, Guy Doleman, Nigel Green, Sue Lloyd, Gordon Jackson, Aubrey Richards, Tony Caunter and Frank Gatliff and was distributed by Rank Film Distributors. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1965 thriller movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:British thriller movies Category:British spy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. Furie Category:Movies set in London Category:Political movies
title: The Ipcress File
